intro.intro_body_0: Our mission is to help you find the best sound meter for your needs. Explore our various sound meter type now!
intro.intro_body_1: We provide you both light and dark theme mode to make your experience more comfortable.
intro.intro_body_2: We support multi-language system to make sure you can use our app without any language barrier.

settings.your_feedback_sent_desc: Thank you for your feedback. We will try our best to improve our app.
settings.not_supported_feature: This feature is not supported yet!
settings.clear_cache_confirm: Are you sure to clear cache of your app? This will remove all your in-app data.

about_us.title: About us
about_us.paragraph_1_body: We are Moonfactory - a software development company based in Vietnam and Japan. Mobile, Frontend & Backend development is our core technologies. We are a team of experienced developers, designers, and testers.
about_us.paragraph_2_body: We are on a mission to help our clients to build great products. We are not just a software development company, we are a team of experienced developers, designers, and testers who are passionate about building great products. We are here to help you to build your product from scratch or to help you to scale your existing product.
about_us.paragraph_3_body: If you have any questions, please contact us via email:
